name: 3D Box Rotator
description:
A 3d box rotator that you can rotate to your heart's content. Made by an aspiring artist for aspiring artist.

I was having trouble with gesturing drawing and perspective so I made an easy tool that could help me quickly get a box's angles down.

Current features of the program:
  • Reset (Spacebar)- You reset the box back to facing you
  • Use Mouse to Rotate - Drag the screen with left click
  • Tilt (Scroll Wheel)
  • Rotation (WASD)
  • Rotate 90 Degrees (The Arrow Keys)
  • Tilt 90 Degrees ([ and ])
  • Randomization (R) - Randomize the tilt and rotation of the box
Program Only Features (Not available on Web):
  • Resizable window
  • Window always stays on top

I plan to add the following features down the line:

  • Save and Load Angles
  • Screenshot button
  • Controls Menu
  • Additional Modes
    • Geometric Shapes - (Rectangular Prism, Cube, Cone, Cylinder)
    • Body Mode - This will have a smaller box below the longer one to act as a pelvis.
  •  The ability to change BG and Box color
  • Mobile Web Version
  • Undo Button
  • Input angles via numbers / Scroll bar
  • Have multiple camera angles / Freely allow player to move camera (MrDrBananaRama)

If you find these features helpful and want to support future development, consider donating! If you have any suggestions that should be added to the program, let me know.
